title: disconecting from game/ login into lol
body: i was playin a normal game n i started laggin i thought it was my internet at first but notice that my teammates were also disconnecting. it was frustrating we had the uper hand all game till the end whe two of my teammates n myself disconected n lost the game. it was my fist of the day witch i was/ i am upset we lost the game and i our 1st of the day boost not mentionning the ip lost. now i cant login witch iam not gonna get my weekend ip boost smh...

replies.body:
There was a service incident last night on NA that was resolved shortly after it began. I'm sorry to hear it prevented you from getting that 1st win of the day combined with the IP boost. 

Let me know if you continue to have issues connecting to the servers.
i am havin trouble with the new client i try the option to use the legacy client at the bottom of the login screen but it only logs out n does notting i need help this new client is so laggy

I'd recommend a clean reinstall of League, since it sounds like your current install is pretty borked. If you grab our [**Hextech tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), all you need to do is check the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall* then hit the **Start** button. After the process completes, launch League to finish the patching process.

Let me know if this worked.
LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
